casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Christina Shea WALTERS 548A00-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 22, 2018 Ms. Shelagh R. Kenney, Attorney at Law, for Walters, Christina Shea Mr. Malcolm Ray Hunter, Jr., Durham, Attorney at Law, for Walters, Christina Shea Ms. Danielle Marquis Elder, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina Mr. Jonathan P. Babb, Raleigh, Special Counsel to Attorney General, for State of North Carolina Mr. James E. Williams, Jr., Carrboro, Attorney at Law, for N.C. Advocates for Justice Mr. James E. Coleman, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Becton, Charles, et al. Mr. Robert P. Mosteller, Attorney at Law, for Retired Members of NC Judiciary Mr. William R. West, District Attorney, for State

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 22nd of June 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of June 2018."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 16th day of July 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
